spec_data.Name: python2-pam
spec_data.Description:
This module provides an authenticate function that allows the caller to
authenticate a given username / password against the PAM system on Linux.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 02:37:59 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Pure Python interface to the Pluggable Authentication Modules system on Linux
